comment.body:
Here is my proof of concept for that "Disable cross-site resource loading to improve privacy" fix: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ScanCY9fjmjanDt7NwvyNQCL16hqWnVM

Note it only works if you have a various previous to 0.5.7

Basically before this update any site could easily tell what other sites you have in your client, even clearnet sites could detect this.
